hooks.name: format-on-edit
hooks.description: Run ruff format on edited Python files
hooks.command: cd /Users/AllenR1_1/Projects/zircote/git-notes-memory-manager && uv run ruff format $CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS 2>/dev/null || true

hooks.name: lint-check-on-edit
hooks.description: Check for lint errors after Python edits
hooks.command: cd /Users/AllenR1_1/Projects/zircote/git-notes-memory-manager && uv run ruff check $CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS --output-format=concise 2>/dev/null | head -20 || true

hooks.name: typecheck-on-edit
hooks.description: Run mypy on edited files to catch type errors
hooks.command: cd /Users/AllenR1_1/Projects/zircote/git-notes-memory-manager && uv run mypy $CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS 2>&1 | grep -E 'error:' | head -10 || true

hooks.name: pre-commit-quality-gate
hooks.description: Full quality check before git commits
hooks.command: if echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -qE 'git commit'; then cd /Users/AllenR1_1/Projects/zircote/git-notes-memory-manager && make quality; fi
